data.description:
## Overview
Quality of life improvements to make GoT CLI more usable and reduce errors during daily work.

## Missing Commands (Encountered During Use)

### 1. `task update` - Modify existing tasks
**Problem:** No way to update task description/title without editing JSON directly
**Current workaround:** Edit `.got/entities/T-*.json` files manually
**Solution:** Add `got task update <ID> [--title TEXT] [--description TEXT] [--priority LEVEL]`

### 2. `task complete --note` - Add completion notes
**Problem:** `task complete` doesn't accept notes/retrospectives
**Current workaround:** None - information is lost
**Solution:** Add `--note TEXT` flag to capture what was learned
**Related:** T-20251223-025609-f3a8453c

### 3. `task assign --sprint` - Link task to sprint
**Problem:** No CLI way to add task to current sprint
**Current workaround:** Manual edge creation or JSON editing
**Solution:** Add `got task assign <ID> --sprint <SPRINT_ID>`

## Error Prevention Improvements

### 4. Validate JSON on task operations
**Problem:** Checksum mismatches can occur after manual edits
**Solution:** Auto-recompute checksums on read, warn if modified externally

### 5. Better error messages for invalid task IDs
**Problem:** Cryptic errors when task ID doesn't exist
**Solution:** Suggest similar task IDs, show recent tasks

### 6. `task edit` - Open in $EDITOR
**Problem:** Complex descriptions hard to write inline
**Solution:** `got task edit <ID>` opens description in $EDITOR

## Nice to Have

### 7. Tab completion for task IDs
**Problem:** Task IDs are long and hard to type
**Solution:** Bash/Zsh completion script for task IDs

### 8. `task search` - Find tasks by keyword
**Problem:** Must grep JSON files to find tasks
**Solution:** `got task search "keyword"` searches titles/descriptions

### 9. Short aliases
**Problem:** Commands are verbose
**Solution:** Add aliases: `t` for task, `s` for sprint, `c` for complete

## Implementation Notes
- All changes in `scripts/got_utils.py`
- Follow existing argparse patterns
- Add tests in `tests/unit/test_got_cli.py`

## Sprint Assignment
Assign to Sprint 17 (SparkSLM) as low-priority improvement.
data.title: GoT CLI usability improvements - quality of life features
